title: From 10-Minute Queries to Real-Time Dashboards: Everactive’s Industrial IoT Stack
author: Team Timescale
description: TL;DR: Everactive replaced a brittle OpenTSDB setup with Timescale to simplify their stack and scale real-time analytics across thousands…
cntitle: 从 10 分钟查询到实时仪表板：Everactive 的工业物联网堆栈
